form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: APPLICATION TO DETERMINE RETURNING RESIDENT STATUS, 1405-0091

full_text: Screened by NARA, 9/27/2023 Lost his G.Card. They donot have INA NUMBER!! OMB APPROVAL NO. 1405-0091 TYPE OR PRINT ALL ANSWERS CLEARLY EXPIRATION DATE: 1-31-98 ESTIMATED BURDEN: 30 MINUTES* U.S. DEPARTMENT OF STATE 8B APPLICATION TO DETERMINE RETURNING RESIDENT STATUS Dee 7194 INSTRUCTIONS: This is an application for Special Immigrant Status under Section 101(a)(27)(A) of the Immigration and Nationality Act, for lawfully admitted permanent resi- dents who are returning from a temporary visit abroad. To qualify you must submit with this application evidence that: (1) You had the status of an alien lawfully admitted for permanent residence at the time of departure from the United States; (2) You departed from the United States with the intention of returning and you have not abandoned this intention; and (3) You are returning to the United States from a temporary visit abroad and, if the stay abroad was protracted, this was caused by reasons beyond your control and for which you are not responsible. Applicants must submit evidence with this application to support the above requirements, including proof of lawful permanent residence, (Examples: Form I-151, 1-551, Reentry Permit, etc.), dates of travel abroad, (Example: airline tickets, passport stamps, etc.), proof of ties to the United States and intent to return, (Example: tax returns, and evidence of economic, family and social ties to the United States), and proof a protracted stay was for reasons beyond the applicant's control, (Examples: medical incapacitation, employment with a U.S. company, accompanying a U.S. citizen spouse, etc.). All documents will be returned to you. 1. NAME (Last name) (First name) (Middle name) SIKRI NARAIN DASS 2. OTHER NAMES USED, ALIASES (If married woman, give malden name) N/A 3. CURRENT HOME ADDRESS AND TELEPHONE NUMBER 157 Sector 14, FARIDABAD, HARYANA 121007, India 12/1/03 4. PLACE OF BIRTH (City, Province, Country) 5. DATE OF BIRTH (Month, Day, Year) KOT SULTAN (Now in Pakistan) 6. MARITAL STATUS Married Single Widowed Divorced If married, Information about spouse - a Name: b. Address: C. Place of Birth: d. Date of Birth: e. U.S. Residence Status, If any (U.S. citizen, LPR, etc.): Permanent Resident 7. LIST BELOW ALL CLOSE FAMILY MEMBERS IN THE UNITED STATES FULL NAME RELATIONSHIP RESIDENCE STATUS PLACE OF RESIDENCE ATAM PRAKASH SIKRI Son U.S. Citizen Burke, VA OM PARKASH SIKRI Son Permanent Resident Silver Spring, MD 8. PREVIOUS IMMIGRATION RECORD a INS "A" Number: Card lost on 12/28/93. Report sent to U.S. Embassy as of 1/14/94 (a copy b. Immigration Category: Permanent Resident attached) C. Previous Immigrant Visa: d. Adjustment of Status PLACE OF ADJUSTMENT OF DATE OF ISSUE DATE OF ADJUSTMENT OF STATUS PLACE OF ISSUE STATUS WITH I.N.S. UE ANN Card lost WITHIN.S. UF AND e. Initial Entry Into the United States: f. Last Entry Into the United States: DATE OF ENTRY PORT OF ENTRY DATE OF ENTRY PORT OF ENTRY 3/20/92 Washington, D.C. Same as first entry 9. MOST RECENT DEPARTURE FROM UNITED STATES Date of Departure: 6/25/93 Destination: New Delhi, India Reason: To meet friends and relatives FORM DSP-117 8-92 Public reporting burden for this collection of Information Is estimated to average 30 minutos per response, Including time required for searching existing data sources, gathering the necessary data. providing the Information required, and reviewing the final collection. Send comments on the accuracy of this estimate of the burden and recommendations for reducing it to: Department of State (OIS/RA/DR) Washington, D.C. 20520-0264. and to the Office of Information and Regulatory Affairs, Office of Management and Budget, Paperwork Reduction Project (1405-0091), Washington, D. C. 20503
